name: European Food Emulsifiers Manufacturers Association
boss: all members (de facto association) all members (de facto association)
memberOrga: EFEMA is a member of EU Specialty Food Ingredients (Federation of European Specialty Food Ingredients Industries), registration no. 6160532422-38
goal:
The main objectives of the Association are to support and promote the general scientific, economic and technical interest of producers in Europe of food emulsifiers based on fats and their derivatives.
For more information, please consult the EFEMA website: www.emulsifiers.org
euInitiatives:
Food Improvement Agents Package
Re-evaluation of food additives (Regulations 1333/2008 and 257/2010).
